languages.text:
The Navigator decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
All allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn.
languages.original_text:
Навигатор сокращает {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончение завесы{/g} на {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}.
Все союзники получают +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} любого {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g} до конца следующего хода навигатора.

traits.locale_text:
The Navigator decreases the veil degradation by <u>(WP bonus)</u> points.
All allies gain +<u>(Navigator's Willpower bonus)</u> deflection against all warp damage and damage from psychic powers until the end of the Navigator's next turn.

The Navigator decreases veil degradation by <u>WP bonus</u> points.
All allies gain +<u>Navigator's Willpower bonus</u> deflection against all warp damage and damage from psychic powers until the end of the Navigator's next turn.

The Navigator decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
All allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn.

The Navigator decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
All allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and damage from {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psychic powers{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

The Navigator decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
All allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn.

languages.text:
Навигатор сокращает {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончение завесы{/g} на {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}.
Все союзники получают +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} любого {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g} до конца следующего хода навигатора.

The Navigator decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
All allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Навигатор сокращает истончение завесы на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ</u>.
Все союзники получают +<u>бонус ВОЛ навигатора</u> к отражению любого варп-урона и урона от психосил до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора.

Навигатор сокращает истончение завесы на <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ</u>.
Все союзники получают +<u>бонус ВОЛ навигатора</u> к отражению любого варп-урона и урона от психосил до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора.

Навигатор сокращает истончение завесы на {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}.
Все союзники получают +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} к отражению любого варп-урона и урона от психосил до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора.

languages.text:
导航者使{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度降低{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}点。
所有盟友在对抗{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}灵能能力{/g}造成的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}伤害{/g}时，获得+{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，效果持续至导航者下个回合结束。
languages.original_text:
The Navigator decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
All allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
导航者的障壁恶化程度降低，降低程度等同于<u>意志{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
所有盟友获得对亚空间伤害与灵能伤害的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}加值，此加值等同于<u>导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}加值</u>，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

导航者的障壁恶化程度降低，降低程度等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}。
所有盟友获得对亚空间伤害与灵能伤害的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}加值，此加值等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

导航者使{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}程度降低{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}点。
所有盟友在对抗{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}灵能能力{/g}造成的{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}伤害{/g}时，获得+{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。

languages.text:
El navegante reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} en −{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} puntos.
Todos los aliados ganan +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} contra todo el {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} hasta el final del próximo turno del navegante.
languages.original_text:
The Navigator decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
All allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
El navegante reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} en {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} puntos.
Todos los aliados ganan +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} contra todo el {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante.

El navegante reduce la degradación del velo en tantos puntos como su {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}.
Todos los aliados ganan +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} contra todo el daño de la disformidad y de los poderes psíquicos hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante.

languages.text:
Der Navigator verringert den {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} um −{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} Punkte.
Alle Verbündeten erhalten +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} gegen allen {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} bis zum Ende des nächsten Zugs des Navigators.
languages.original_text:
The Navigator decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
All allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Der Navigator verringert den Zerfall des Schleiers um <u>WK-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> Punkte.
Alle Verbündeten erhalten +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft-{/g}Bonus</u> des Navigators {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} gegen allen Warpschaden und Schaden durch psychische Kräfte bis zum Ende der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Navigators.

Der Navigator verringert den Zerfall des Schleiers um {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} Punkte.
Alle Verbündeten erhalten +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} des Navigators {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} gegen allen Warpschaden und Schaden durch psychische Kräfte bis zum Ende der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Navigators.

languages.text:
Le navigateur réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du voile{/g} de {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
Tous les alliés bénéficient de +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} contre tous les {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts du Warp{/g} et tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} jusqu'à la fin du prochain tour du navigateur.
languages.original_text:
The Navigator decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
All allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
Le Navigateur réduit la Dégradation du Voile de <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de VOL</u> points.
Tous les alliés bénéficient de +<u>bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} du Navigateur</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} contre tous les dégâts warp et tous les dégâts des pouvoirs psychiques jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Navigateur.

Le Navigateur réduit la Dégradation du Voile de {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
Tous les alliés bénéficient de +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} contre tous les dégâts warp et tous les dégâts des pouvoirs psychiques jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Navigateur.

languages.text:
航宙士は{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}を−{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}ポイント減少させる。
すべての味方は、航宙士の次のターン終了まで、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}歪みダメージ{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を+{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}得る。
languages.original_text:
The Navigator decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
All allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn.

traits.locale_text:
航宙士は{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}を−{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}ポイント減少させる。
すべての味方は、航宙士の次のターン終了まで、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}歪みダメージ{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}を+{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}得る。

航宙士はヴェールの劣化を{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}ポイント減少させる。
すべての味方は、航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、すべてのワープダメージおよび超能力によるダメージに+{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}を得る。

航宙士は{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}を-{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}ポイント減少させる。
すべての味方は、航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了まで、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に+{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}の{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}を得る。

languages.text:
Rotacı, {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}örtü bozulmasını{/g} {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} kadar azaltır.
Tüm dost birimler, bütün {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}öteboyut hasarlarına{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçlerinin{/g} verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarlara{/g} karşı +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turunun sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text:
The Navigator decreases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by −{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} points.
All allies gain +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} against all {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn.
